summary.span: 获取所模拟识别的结果。

span.span: Gets the results of emulated recognition.

value.span: 有关识别结果的详细信息，如果发生错误，则为 。

span.span: Detailed information about the results of recognition, or if an error occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是从派生的 ，其中包含有关由识别操作返回的短语的完整信息。The object derives from and contains full information about a phrase returned by a recognition operation. 可以从属性中获取所有识别候选项的列表 。You can obtain a list off all the recognition candidates from the property. 如果识别器在识别操作期间遇到异常，则 属性将设置为异常，并将 属性设置为 `null` 。If recognizer encounters an exception during the recognition operation, the property is set to the exception and the property is set to `null`.
